storyInfo: Those who slack off will always run into unexpected problems.

attributes.content: How did I let Kroos slip away again...?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Don't be mad, Captain. Kroos isn't a bad girl.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: It's just—I'm supervising her work, and every single time...
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: She just wants to take it easy sometimes.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Next time, maybe you should be the one keeping an eye on her. It kind of feels like she listens to you more...
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: It's not like I do anything special either. I just watch her work.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: If she needs my help, l help her, and she goes back to doing it herself after a while.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Well, what can I say? I shouldn't have expected any less from you, Beagle.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: I'm not sure why, but whenever she has half a mind to slack off, there is just no way I can keep her working...
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Sometimes she's got a stomachache. Sometimes it's Instructor Dobermann calling for her, and I always just believe her.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: And before I know it, she's gone.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Kroos, back to duty with me!
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: (I'm just trying to take a short break!)
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: (Huh? Why is Fang getting faster and faster?!)
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: 'Is there anything else you would like to listen to?'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'Okay, Lens will look it up in the library.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: Is it okay if I sit down next to you, Scene?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: 'Miss Scene says she doesn't mind. Go ahead!'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: I mean, there's a Kuranta chasing me~
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: 'Oh, I can hear her now. It's Fang.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: We're actually playing hide-and-seek right now.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: And after she found me, it kind of turned into a race~
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Hey, Lens. Help me out, will you?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: 'Miss Scene says it sounds very interesting. Lens will therefore be providing all the assistance you need, Kroos.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'However, I can't guarantee that Fang won't recognize you.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: Well, if she catches me, I guess she'll have rightfully earned her victory~
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: (Oh, have these buggies been here the whole time? I didn't even notice.)
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I know she hopped in here for sure.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: She's getting way too good at hiding...
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Fang—I saw Kroos run toward the cafeteria!
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: 'Congratulations, Kroos. It looks like you're still hidden.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: I've seen the way Scene hides on missions before.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: 'Lens uses a revolutionary new camouflage technique that combines stealth and optical refraction technologies, among others, to satisfy Miss Scene's needs.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'I'm sorry, Miss Scene. Lens forgot to put on music for you.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: Is it okay if I chill here for a little bit, too?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: By the way, what are you doing here, Scene?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: 'Miss Scene is brainstorming ideas for her next piece.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'She may look like she's spacing out, but make no mistake. She's thinking.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'And while she has her thinking cap on, it is Lens's job to play music and deliver food to her.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: Isn't there anyone chasing her down, trying to get her to work?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: 'If anyone tried to, Lens would activate these camouflage techniques. No one would be able to find her.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: I wish I could live like Scene does.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: 'I believe Miss Scene said something similar before.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'Something along the lines of, 'I wish I could live the way Cautuses do—' Something like that.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: What's so nice about us Cautuses?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Ever since I was young, everyone's always told me that Cautuses are meant to be more energetic, and that I shouldn't be so lazy.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: But all I ever wanna do is clear my mind and lay on the couch the whole day.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: 'What Miss Scene is saying is you can make your own decisions, and that is a joy in itself.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'Lens is able to take photos very quickly. Through the use of my system's auxiliary operations, Lens is capable of snapping photos of running Kuranta and storing those photos in my album without issues.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'Even when she's photographing people, Miss Scene takes a very long time, almost like she's sketching.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'That's why Miss Scene is a good scenery photographer. She's not good at it because she likes taking photos of landscapes.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'She wants to take photos of everything, but, most of the time, she's only able to take photos of still objects. Only they have the patience to wait until she's done without moving.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'You don't like to move, but if you put your mind to it, you can still be pretty agile.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'Both Lens and Click have edited operational records of your missions, Kroos.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'You usually just hang out around the destination, but once an order comes, you always head towards the new destination quickly. That makes you no different from the other Cautuses.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: That's just because I could die if I mess up~
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: 'Without Lens, Miss Scene wouldn't even be able to move to the next location.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'Lens believes there's a difference between can't do and don't want to do.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'There are too many things that we can't do, so let's do the things that we can do the best we can.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'This is something that Scene told Lens before.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'Of course, Miss Scene may be able to do fewer things, but the things that she can do, she does with relative ease.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'In your case, Lens supposes you probably focus on putting your energy where it matters because you know your limits?'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: But it could also be because I don't wanna work.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: 'Oh, sorry about that. The reception here isn't very good.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'The motivational r-routine that Lens s-selected to inspire you had a few e-errors.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: Scene, are you trying to say something?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Gotcha. I'll look for Mayer. You stay here to look after Lens.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Fang, I got mixed up and went after the wrong person.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: You know, there's quite a bit of difference between Leonhardt and Kroos...
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: I'm so sorry! I should've been more careful!
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: It's fine. Let's look for her again. If we don't find her, we'll have to ask Meteor or Gitano for help.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Kroos isn't going to get away.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: It kind of seems like she's got your full attention today, Captain.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: You usually turn a blind eye, but you seem really mad this time.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: You know what Kroos said when she ran away?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: She said today's the anniversary of me becoming our leader, so she was going to pick out a present for me.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: She never came back, in the end. I didn't even realize until you returned to the dorm.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Then that's really mean of her.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: I'll give her a good scolding myself.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: I hope I'm not seeing things again...
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Looks like she's in a hurry.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Come. Let's go take a look.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: (Isn't this an automatic door? Why isn't it opening?)
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I need a favor. Is it okay~?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Ehh, my ventilation fan is on. Why is it so strong over here?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: I'm painting right now. Why don't you step outside first?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Let me finish up here. I'll be right with you!
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: If you just want some quick repairs, you should try Engineering. I don't think I'll be much help.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Oh—Lens is dead? Shouldn't you get Closure then?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: You're in luck today. I don't have anything in that much of a rush. Otherwise, you'd have come all this way for nothing.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Keep in mind, though, if those A.I. things with the four wheels run into problems, you should try Closure first.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Looks like Kroos is actually busy!
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Huh? We don't need to follow her anymore?
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: If she's actually busy, then let's not get in the way.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: We'll clean up Kroos's mess for her and get something to eat.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Hey, slow down. I haven't had breakfast...
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: 'Lens actually rebooted not long after you left.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'Lens sometimes runs into problems with certain functions. It isn't uncommon for Lens to reboot.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'Oh, you mean what Miss Scene was trying to say? She was trying to tell you that it's okay.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: 'She takes a liiiittle while to get her words out, so she might've given you the wrong impression.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: Well, guess I came all the way here for nothing.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: 'Sorry about that, Miss Mayer. Lens is doing very well.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: Well, let me take a look...
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Doesn't seem like there's anything wrong on the outside.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: You said you crashed just now, right?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Then that should be a problem with the system.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: You said it yourself. You reboot often, right?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Closure didn't try to fix that for you?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: 'Closure has already ordered replacement parts for Lens. It won't be long before Lens receives an upgrade.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: So those parts were for you, huh?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: I visited that dungeon of hers yesterday. She was working for the better part of the day.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: She said it was some kind of 'advanced component used in extreme circumstances to be installed on a high-end mobile photography platform.'
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Well, this is perfect. Let's go pay Closure a visit now. We'll take care of this problem of yours.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: That way, you won't find yourself freezing up or having to install OS updates while you're out on a mission.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: 'But Lens is afraid it takes Miss Scene a while to get around too. Lens will walk with Miss Scene, so we likely won't be able to come with you straight to Closure's.'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: Okay, let's get going, then. Get it over with quickly, and I'll get to go to bed early. I have lots of work to get done tomorrow.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: 'Oh, Mayer, please don't push me around like that!'
attributes.name: Lens

attributes.content: Don't worry, Miss Mayer's just a little impatient~
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Let's just take our time and walk there slowly~
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Fang, here's some dessert I picked up for you~
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Leave them on the table. We'll share them tomorrow.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: We're going to bed. It's all yours.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: See, Fang? Kroos actually worked all day.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: She even bought you a present.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: I wasn't trying to reprimand her, you know.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: If she really wants to take a break, all she has to do is tell me. I'm not going to say no.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: It's just the way she goes about makes me kinda upset sometimes.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Kroos is too shy to actually say it. She's actually really thoughtful.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: I kind of think she's just toying with me.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Well, she's really close with you.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Kroos doesn't do that to most people.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: *Sigh*... I'd rather she treated me a little more normal...
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Let's go to bed. We have training first thing tomorrow morning.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Be sure to wake Kroos up. She looked pretty tired when she got back. She just might not get up on her own.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Relax, Fang, I'll drag her there if I have to.
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Whatever, not gonna worry too much about it.
attributes.name: Fang
